channel.title: XenonScape
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://www.rune-server.org/static/signaturepic/sigpic316413_1.gif[/img][/CENTER] [CENTER][size=4]-[/Size] [URL=http://"http://xenon-scape.com/"][size=4]Home[/size][/URL] [size=4]-[/size] [URL=http://"http://xenon-scape.com/forum/"][size=4]Forums[/size][/URL] [size=4]-[/size][/CENTER]
[CENTER][size=3]XenonScape is a growing 718 rsps that's been under development for months with daily updates keeping the server up to date and players happy! Xenon is perfect for players looking for a friendly, active community who enjoy PvMing and Skilling. We offer all 25 working skills, 4 different xp modes, multiple bosses including Nex and Vorago, and much more![/CENTER]
[SPOILER=Xenon Features]
[ul][*]Very Active Staff, Daily Updates [*]High-Def Graphics w/ Min, Low, Med, High and Custom Set-Up Options, as well as Fixed, Resizeable and Full-Screen Screen Sizes [*]Male & Female Character Models [*]Four XP Modes: Easy, Medium, Hard and Extreme [*]Different Drop Rates (Scales w/ Chosen XP Mode) [*]Iron Man Mode [*]Dominion Tower [*]Custom Items and Bosses that drop T90 Armor and Weapons [*]Nex Drops including Torva, Pernix and Virtus (Nex's stages will be fixed soon) [*]Loyalty and Vote Point Systems w/ Shops (Includes XP Lamps, Mystery Boxes and Auras!) [*](Cosmetics) Clue Scrolls [*]Crystal Chest (Not OP) [*]Working Mastery (Lvl 120) Skillcapes [*]Unlockable Lodestones [*]Bonfires (Firemaking) [*]Auto-Voting [*]Ability to make Godswords, Armadyl Battlestaff, Dragonfire Shields, and More [*]Bank w/ Tabs [*]Living Rock Caverns [*]Changeable Task Tab (Teleports, Player Information)[/ul]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [CENTER] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/57746a7dbe3d0_XenonHome.png.3bb3d18c3415b8eadb92d76619b17883.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/57746a74a6d9e_DungFloorBoss.png.7a47851de1096e200181070377175f5e.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/57746a755c07b_DungFloorOptions.png.2efa0e3510dee1862015a49afa03e481.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/57746a5b791e5_DomTower.png.4b1b86e724b739e0c5e7c2a4cf86c904.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/ROS.png.bc0b458ae484a71f5199a130f059d0ad.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/QBD.png.89ec7d10070d5321c41063d1e01e7990.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/57746a7fabbbb_YkLagor.png.b83860b08aaa1c5e0e4d6acbf86b3f32.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/Nex.png.498ac22a51b2459d33fa99db22d3ccb6.png[/img] [IMG]http://xenon-scape.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_06/Vorago.png.75278747ff9355cbdce377a122000d99.png[/img] [/CENTER] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Updates]
[ul][*]Dagannoth Kings Added [*]Rise of the Six Added [*]Fight Caves Are a Pre-Req to Fight Kiln [*]Removed Donator Shop [*]Repair Stand @ Home [*]Several Shops Repriced, Stock Fixed [*]Thieving No Longer Damages [*]Spelling Fixes [*]Teleport Fixes[/ul]
[/SPOILER]

item.title: XenonScape
item.dc:creator: @Flamion Flamion
item.description:
@Flamion wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]
[CENTER][size=4]-[/Size] [URL=http://“http://xenon-scape.com/”][size=4]Home[/size][/URL] [size=4]-[/size] [URL=http://“http://xenon-scape.com/forum/”][size=4]Forums[/size][/URL] [size=4]-[/size][/CENTER]

[CENTER][size=3]XenonScape is a growing 718 rsps that’s been under development for months with daily updates keeping the server up to date and players happy! Xenon is perfect for players looking for a friendly, active community who enjoy PvMing and Skilling. We offer all 25 working skills, 4 different xp modes, multiple bosses including Nex and Vorago, and much more![/CENTER]

[SPOILER=Xenon Features]

[ul][]Very Active Staff, Daily Updates
[]High-Def Graphics w/ Min, Low, Med, High and Custom Set-Up Options, as well as Fixed, Resizeable and Full-Screen Screen Sizes
[]Male & Female Character Models
[]Four XP Modes: Easy, Medium, Hard and Extreme
[]Different Drop Rates (Scales w/ Chosen XP Mode)
[]Iron Man Mode
[]Dominion Tower
[]Custom Items and Bosses that drop T90 Armor and Weapons
[]Nex Drops including Torva, Pernix and Virtus (Nex’s stages will be fixed soon)
[]Loyalty and Vote Point Systems w/ Shops (Includes XP Lamps, Mystery Boxes and Auras!)
* Clue Scrolls
[]Crystal Chest (Not OP)
[]Working Mastery (Lvl 120) Skillcapes
[]Unlockable Lodestones
[]Bonfires (Firemaking)
[]Auto-Voting
[]Ability to make Godswords, Armadyl Battlestaff, Dragonfire Shields, and More
[]Bank w/ Tabs
[]Living Rock Caverns
[*]Changeable Task Tab (Teleports, Player Information)[/ul]

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Media]
[CENTER]









[/CENTER]
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Updates]

[ul][]Dagannoth Kings Added
[]Rise of the Six Added
[]Fight Caves Are a Pre-Req to Fight Kiln
[]Removed Donator Shop
[]Repair Stand @ Home
[]Several Shops Repriced, Stock Fixed
[]Thieving No Longer Damages
[]Spelling Fixes
[*]Teleport Fixes[/ul]

[/SPOILER]
